subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Patrik Elias scored the go-ahead goal in the second period, and Martin Brodeur made 20 saves in the visiting Devils’ 4-1 victory against the Carolina Hurricanes on Thursday night.
snippet: Patrik Elias scored the go-ahead goal in the second period, and Martin Brodeur made 20 saves in the visiting Devils’ 4-1 victory against the Carolina Hurricanes on Thursday night.
